title: Orange County Issues Severe Weather Preparedness Advisory
summary: County officials urge residents to prepare for severe thunderstorms expected to impact the region this evening.
body: Orange County Emergency Management is advising residents to take immediate precautions ahead of a strong line of thunderstorms forecasted to move through the area later today. The National Weather Service reports the potential for damaging winds exceeding 60 mph, frequent lightning, and localized flooding in lowâ€‘lying areas. Residents are encouraged to secure outdoor items, avoid unnecessary travel, and monitor official county communication channels for updates.
